row.entry: This value set be used to specify the client's relationship to the Substitute Decision Maker â€“ if one is involved in the creation of the privacy consent directive

This value set is used to specify the relationship between the individual authenticating the privacy consent directive and the person who is the target of that record. This value set may specify a spouse, parent, child, etc. The readers are encouraged to refer to the source value set definitions for a comprehensive description and explanation of codes.
